translation.first-section-h1: Still using notepad to keep your passwords?
translation.first-section-p: Protect yourself and your entire family with an application that will store your most valuable information safely.
translation.second-section-h1: Much more than a password manager
translation.first-li-p-second-section: Passwords, bank accounts, credit cards and everything you need at any time.
translation.second-li-p-second-section: All your passwords are encrypted in our database, ensuring they are not leaked.
translation.third-li-p-second-section: Lost your phone? Your data will be the last thing you need to worry about, it's safe on our app.
translation.third-section-first-p: A password manager is like a digital safe for your passwords. Instead of trying to remember dozens of passwords or using the same one everywhere (which isn't safe), a password manager stores them all in one secure place. Whenever you need a password, you can easily access it through the app. You only have to remember one master password, and the manager handles the rest.
translation.third-section-second-p: Yes, Omniloq is designed with your security in mind. Your passwords are locked away using strong encryption, which means they are turned into a secret code that only you can unlock. Even if someone else tries to look at your information, they wouldn't be able to make sense of it. Plus, Omniloq never shares your passwords with anyone and uses the latest technology to keep everything secure.
translation.third-section-third-span: Does Omniloq store the passwords in the cloud?
translation.third-section-third-p: Yes, Omniloq does store your passwords on a secure server, but don't worry! They're heavily protected with encryption, so even while they are in the cloud, they remain private and safe. This also means you can access your passwords from any device you log into, without worrying about losing them.
translation.third-section-fourth-span: What happens if I forget my master password?
translation.third-section-fourth-p: If you forget your master password, Omniloq cannot recover it for you because it is designed to ensure your security and privacy. This means you'll need to reset your account, which could cause you to lose access to your stored passwords. To avoid this, it's a good idea to store your master password in a safe place or use a method like writing it down and storing it securely.
translation.all-fields-required: All fields must be filled in.
translation.all-required-fields: All required fields must be filled in.
translation.name: Name
translation.action-irreversible: This action is irreversible, are you sure that want to do it?

translation.warning-description: Our server takes around 2 minutes to load, please wait.
